title: Transcension
description: Transcension is a 2D game I developed myself. Trapped inside your mind, you must traverse a treacherous path, overcome various traps, and defeat the guard of your prison.

title: SharpPlay
description: SharpPlay is a custom music player I built for people who value privacy, customizability, and data. All your data is local, far out of reach from the people who seek to sell it. Moreover, you can explore your usage statistics for individual songs and your overall listening habits, with the latter being displayed elegantly on a graph within the app.

title: Inticate
description: Inticate is a 2D platformer with unique coins that have interesting effects. The goal of the game is to complete the levels, but be warned, besides the easy level, this game might just be impossible.

title: Emma
description: Emma is a personal assistant that communicates via audio. I made this assistant for myself and a long time ago, so unless I revamp her she will not be available.
